TopicTitle: Solr index takes too long after including vocabulary tags

Articles.Content:
hi, recently we have included our clan version 2.5.2 vocabulary tags, we have created the vocabulary with the vocabulary_create (context, vocab_data) method
indicated in the ckan documentation and have been created successfully.
When we federate that related tags are added to the defined vocabulary, we start to have indexing problems. if we execute the indexing of solr the process takes too long, it does not give an error but what took an hour now becomes a week.
If we delete the tags associated with the vocabularies, the reindexing process is correct again.
we need to know how to correct this behavior. thank you so much!!!
Are you aware this is a forum for a video game?
